title: What type of punch machine do you have: V1, V2, or V3?
content: Punch machine V1If your business has had its punch machine for a very long time, you probably have the V1 model.You can check it if the home interface looks like the image below.V2 and V3 punch machineIf your company has had its punch machine since 2019 you probably have the V2 model.On the contrary, if your company acquired its machine during the year 2020 you have the latest model: the V3.You can check with the images below which home interface you have to determine the model of your punch machine.The V3 unlike the V2 will allow you to offer surveys, surveys to your team directly on your punch machine, such as the Covid-19 survey, for example.We can update your V2 model for free so that you have the V3 model while keeping the same machine.This update is not possible for the virtual punch machine alternative.If you are interested in this change, please contact us by ticket.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
